articles.description: Latest on Man Utd's move to appoint Ruben Amorim as manager, plus match reaction and build-up to Wednesday's games.
articles.title: Football latest: Ruben Amorim latest, Man Utd, Northern Ireland, Scotland, Wales, EFL Cup

articles.description: Sporting head coach Ruben Amorim says he has not yet made a decision about his future after Manchester United expressed an interest in appointing him as manager.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd target yet to make decision about future

articles.description: The New York Yankees record a 11-4 win over the Los Angeles Dodgers, who lead the best-of-seven series 3-1.
articles.title: MLB World Series 2024: Yankees 11-4 Dodgers - hosts keep hopes alive

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou said he "always" wins a trophy in his second season. Before the EFL Cup tie against Manchester City, BBC Sport takes a look at his chances.
articles.title: Tottenham v Manchester City: Will Ange Postecoglou guide Spurs to second-season success?

articles.description: Cam Roigard suffered a knee injury that threatened to derail his Test career before it had properly started. But he is back - quicker and stronger than ever.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Cam Roigard's return after knee injury

articles.description: After edging out South Africa in a friendly, manager Sarina Wiegman says "football is a game of mistakes" and England want to have "as few of them as possible".
articles.title: Mistakes remain but England friendlies valuable - Sarina Wiegman

articles.description: BBC Sport speaks to those who witnessed the epic heavyweight title fight between Muhammad Ali and George Foreman in Zaire.
articles.title: The Rumble in the Jungle 50 years on, by those who witnessed it

articles.description: England's time to "get over the line" in tight Test matches against the world's best sides is now, says number eight Ben Earl.
articles.title: England vs New Zealand: Ben Earl confident England's time is now to win tight Tests

articles.description: Commentators, journalists and politicians in Brazil criticise the decision to award the Ballon d'Or to Manchester City's Rodri rather than Vinicius Junior of Real Madrid.
articles.title: Vinicius Junior: Brazil reacts to the 'injustice' of Real Madrid forward missing out on Ballon d'Or to Man City's Rodri

articles.description: The 2025 Tour de France will be staged exclusively in France for the first time in five years.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 route: Race to take all-French route for first time since 2020
